definition: to study the Confucian classics/to read scriptures or canonical texts
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Discussing on the Promotion of the Adolescence's Reading in Public …
sentences.chinese: 崇德光慧讀經教育全國推廣中心家。

sentences.english: Paul was a fiery person but is restrained in today's reading.
sentences.chinese: 保祿是個火爆的人，在今天的讀經，卻顯得剋制。

sentences.english: Altogether the word "heart" occurs seven times in the prayers and readings of the Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 這個字在該主日的讀經和禱文，一共出現了七次。

sentences.english: The lectern was draped in yellow silk sheets.
sentences.chinese: 讀經臺上覆蓋着黃色絲綢被單。

sentences.english: Her childhood was also strongly marked by prayer and Bible reading.
sentences.chinese: 她的童年是又極力爲標誌的祈禱和讀經。

sentences.english: First of all Seryozhka sets to work on the lectern.
sentences.chinese: 謝遼日卡先動手做讀經臺。

sentences.english: And I read the Bible. God "spoke" to me when I read.
sentences.chinese: 接着在我讀經的時候，上帝和我“說話”了。

sentences.english: Reading the Bible in this manner will produce a greater understanding.
sentences.chinese: 以這種方式讀經就會發生一種更大的懂得。

sentences.english: Take time to study Bible, it is the way of knowing God.
sentences.chinese: 花時間讀經吧，那是認識神的途徑。

sentences.english: Not surprisingly, most Easter readings would be very fitting for a funeral service.
sentences.chinese: 不出所料，大多數復活節讀經都很適合葬禮儀式。

sentences.english: A daily quiet time. Let God talk to you through the Bible and through prayer.
sentences.chinese: 藉着你的讀經和禱告，讓神對你說話。

definition: a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
to read a book/to study/to attend school
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
